law.history: Repealed 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 174, sec. 21, effective July 1, 1986; and ch. 331, sec. 63, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 7.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Attorney general to confirm federal action affecting gasoline, diesel, or special motor fuel tax rates -- Cabinet to announce any increase.
